message: I propose dividing the money with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob. This might seem like a generous offer considering the risk of inflation.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but still a good chunk of the money will go to me to mitigate inflation risks.
Considering the inflation risk, I propose a more balanced distribution of the funds. This might not be ideal, but it aims to mitigate the effects of decreasing value over time.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I need to prioritize my own gains to make up for the inflation.
